title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Introduction to heat exchangers; types, applications, materials, specification and selection. Review of fluid mechanics and heat transfer, two-phase flow; correlations. Methodology for thermal design of heat exchangers. Rating and sizing problems. Pressure drop calculations. Shell and tube equipment; flow induced vibration; standards: TEMA. Design consideration for plate type devices; regenerators; condensers and boilers; cooling towers and heat pipes. Heat exchanger fouling. Enhancement of heat transfer. Compact heat exchangers. Optimization of heat exchangers; modelling and commercial codes.
